display_long_description:
# 🎃The Haunted Heights Update is Here!🎃
A spooky new Chain Mode challenge has arrived in Crowbar Climber! In the Haunted Heights stage, you and one friend must climb your way out of the haunted campgrounds and make it home before the spirits catch you!
Climb together while chained, but beware of the ghosts and ghouls that lurk in the shadows, ready to block your path and send you tumbling back down!  Communication and teamwork are your only hope for survival!
Can you and your partner escape the haunted camp and make it home in one piece? Or will you become the next lost souls of Haunted Heights?

**This game is a challenge for all VR gamers who love physics and brain teasers.**
For VR gamers who are strong in both mind and arm... see you at the top!
[media]

# 💪Your hands are crowbars—ready to start climbing💪

In Crowbar Climber, use your crowbars to make your way up!
Face hooks, planks, and gears using only your arms.
Can you beat the game before you run out of energy?

[media]

# 🧗‍♂️Master the art of climbing through physics!🧗‍♀️

Control your environment and body using a crowbar that reacts to every move.
Grab hooks at the last second, launch yourself with powerful swings, and cling to ledges in creative ways.

[media]

# 📸Share your gameplay videos with friends!🎥

Record both first-person and third-person perspectives, just like in the promo video.

Show off your crowbar-climbing skills to friends or share on social media.


[media]

# 💪Your hands are crowbars—ready to start climbing💪

In Crowbar Climber, use your crowbars to make your way up!
Face hooks, planks, and gears using only your arms.
Can you beat the game before you run out of energy?

![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38974783_1245640976757644_6511698305735211905_n.mp4?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=RTVxjwnBcTsQ7kNvwFlWMYD&_nc_oc=Admxh9Zj8kM2K9Cq933s8hzP7B94ro5TPyBftz5U_iGXcVs-R7HZooSXzKfEVldUGhw&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=1UbX_Uf5wFtCmPEz7X-RDg&oh=00_AfeqcPvKc4gNJDL6kNDGdAh25mRtkp25YulPtXtm6siyEQ&oe=69040617)

# 🧗‍♂️Master the art of climbing through physics!🧗‍♀️

Control your environment and body using a crowbar that reacts to every move.
Grab hooks at the last second, launch yourself with powerful swings, and cling to ledges in creative ways.

Record both first-person and third-person perspectives, just like in the promo video.
